item.title: 2020 06 28 Podcast Another Issue
Setup podcast blog - 자동화
item.description: Scripts Automation mini2 - record mp3 file $ crontab -l 00 11 * * * cd /Users/cychong/work/cbs-ost/script && ./record.sh >> /tmp/cron.out 2>&1 mini1 - create MD file and publish podcast $ crontab -l 04 12 * * * cd /home/cychong/work/cbs-ost/script && ./scp.sh >> /tmp/cron.out 2>&1 05 12 * * * cd /home/cychong/work/cbs-ost/script && ./publish.sh >> /tmp/cron.out 2>&1 Get mp3 file from mini2 Create md file after getting song list Rebuild site to publish the updated podcast

item.title: Play with Ansible
item.description: Configuration ansible client A ansible target B, C In client Ansible targets(B,C) should be listed in the following file. If required additional parameters can be specified such as login account, ssh port and etc # /etc/ansible/hosts 192.168.1.100 ansible_ssh_user=cychong ansible_ssh_port=22 192.168.1.200 ansible_ssh_user=cychong ansible_ssh_port=22 In ansible targets A should be found on the following file # grep A .ssh/authorized_keys Test run from A # ansible all -m ping 192.
